summary: Completed comprehensive testing of updated PDF Reading Timer with real-time clock features. All new features working correctly including real device time capture, 60-minute fixed duration, paragraph time scheduling, question ignoring (¿QUÉ RESPONDERÍAS?), and final question marking.
passed_tests: Timer captures real device time when started (15:09 → 16:09)
Shows start time and end time (exactly 60 minutes later)
Each paragraph displays scheduled start/end times based on real clock
Question '¿QUÉ RESPONDERÍAS?' properly ignored and not counted
Final questions (before ¿QUÉ RESPONDERÍAS?) correctly marked with FINAL badges
Final questions alert displays with correct timing
Final questions have red styling (border and background)
Time remaining countdown from 60 minutes works correctly
Progress bar updates correctly during timer operation
PDF upload and analysis works with new question detection
Backend API returns correct question counts (3 questions, ignoring QUE RESPONDERIAS)
Backend correctly marks is_final_question: true for questions before ignored question
Reading time calculation accurate at 180 WPM
Question time calculation accurate at 35 seconds per question
All data-testid attributes present for testing
